sect2.title: FormatCasts-Action
sect2.para: The FormatCasts-Action allows to format how casts look, uppercase, lowercase and if they are followed by a T_WHITESPACE containing a space or directly attached to the following token.

para.literallayout: The option searchedTokens allows to specify which casts should look how (array with token-constant as index and value as string). The option whitespaceBehindCasts specifies if there is a space after the cast or not.
